text: You know, writing is really difficult, and it takes a real patience and a skill. I don't know if I have that. I admire it in others, so much, and I envy it.
author: Adam Scott

text: Beauty, unlike the rest of the gifts handed out at birth, does not require dedication, patience and hard work to pay off. But it's also the only gift that does not keep on giving.
author: Paulina Porizkova

text: My three Ps: passion, patience, perseverance. You have to do this if you've got to be a filmmaker.
author: Robert Wise

text: Sometimes they are a matter of luck the photographer could not expect or hope for them. Sometimes they are a matter of patience, waiting for an effect to be repeated that he has seen and lost or for one that he anticipates.
author: Bill Brandt

text: I think there's not much patience for organized labour, period, public or private sector.
author: Kathleen Wynne
